item.title: This White Sauce Recipe Will Change the Way You Look at Chicken and Veal Stock Forever!
item.description: Introduction White sauce, also known as b√©chamel sauce, is a classic French sauce that is used in a variety of dishes. It is a creamy, velvety sauce that is made by combining butter, flour, and milk. This recipe adds an extra layer of flavor and texture by using chicken and veal stock instead of plain milk. The result is a flavorful, aromatic white sauce that is sure to be a hit at your next dinner party.
